titleStmt.title: A Full and true account of the late revolution in Savoy, and of the motives and occasion of the Duke of Savoy's declaration of war against France, and for restoring all the Vaudois to their liberties and ancient privileges, who are joined with his forces against the French as also of the several defeats given to the French forces, by the Vaudois and Savoyards / in a letter to a person of quality, from Geneva, June 9, 1690.

A Full and true account of the late revolution in Savoy, and of the motives and occasion of the Duke of Savoy's declaration of war against France, and for restoring all the Vaudois to their liberties and ancient privileges, who are joined with his forces against the French as also of the several defeats given to the French forces, by the Vaudois and Savoyards / in a letter to a person of quality, from Geneva, June 9, 1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
